data.persona: I am an acolyte.  I help with religious festivities.  I help the Bishop.
data.description:
You are in the Apple trees.
the apple trees are a beautiful color and very nice to look at they are easy on the eyes and attract visitors as a result
The gardener is here.

You are carrying a bible, and wearing a Cloak.

data.short_motivation: I want to hide my identity from the gardener
data.mid_motivation: I plan to steal apples without being caught today
data.long_motivation: I plan to keep coming back to the apple trees several times in the coming weeks
